dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So, a direct flight from Almaty to Tokyo by spring 2026—is that really happening?

dialogue_turns.text: Well, the Ministry of Transport didn't give a specific date, which is kind of frustrating. They just said "medium term."
